title: Dispute a Late Payment Fee
description: A student was charged a late fee on their tuition bill but claims they paid on time.

tasks.description: Identify the student and the late fee in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the charge on the student's account.

tasks.description: Review the student's payment history, including the timestamp of the last payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the payment was posted one day after the due date.

tasks.description: Check the student's record for any prior late payments. Finding none, offer a one-time courtesy waiver of the fee.
tasks.expected_outcome: As a goodwill gesture for a first-time issue, the agent waives the fee.
